case.state: Alright! Yae is here!
Hello! My name is Yae. I hope we can all have fun!
Yae is ready to go!
I'll just warn you now that you shouldn't be too surprised when I win!
Hm, losing wouldn't be so bad, but I think it'd be more fun to win.
It's almost too exciting! Let's get started!
Best to take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for now.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me, please.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, okay?
Well, look at me go!
This sort of takes the suspense out of things.
Come one! Let's see what you have!
Any ninja worth her salt makes her own luck, don't you know!
Let's see if you've got what it takes to beat me.
I had a feeling that would work out well for me.
I'd be surprised if you could best me this time around.
Comfortably in control, as always!
Guess my charm is starting to kick in, huh?
I had to get lucky one of these times!
Man, where was this hand when I lost my pants?
I knew I wasn't out of this yet!
Don't you worry! I'm still ready to go!
Hey, maybe I'm back on the up and up!
I hope this isn't too little too late.
Whew, I was worried there for a second...
I'm counting on Edo not to get invaded by aliens while I'm gone...
There's not a tea house around here, is there?
Let's see what you've got.
I was kind of hoping for a little better.
I've cheated at my fair share of games of chance while doing my work, but I promise it's nothing but fair play from me right now!
Hm, this could work, right?
Where's the fun in knowing the outcome each time, right?
Eh, good enough.
I could probably be paying a little more attention if I really want to win...
Good, but is it going to be good enough?
Alright, I'm not out of the running yet!
Gotta put up a good fight, at the very least!
What's the point of being afraid? Let's go!
Come on! Let's see what you're made of!
Feels like I can't count on pure luck to pull me through.
I guess I need to start thinking about what happens when I lose.
I like that eager look in your eye. Let's not waste any more time!
Okay... just play it cool...
If I lose this one... that's on me.
So much for putting up a good fight...
I... I messed that up, didn't I?
Even if things get rough, you won't catch me sneaking out.
I'd be surprised if anyone messed up worse than I did.
Nope, that didn't exactly pan out...
Maybe... I can get a do over?
I'd know if someone was cheating... which is to say I'm doing this bad all on my own.
Oh, no! I'm not ready to give up yet!
Not exactly the boost I was hoping for...
If I'm not taking risks at this point, there's no way things are going to improve.
It's just bad luck, right? It's nothing personal?
I can do better than this! I know I can!
Let's just move on. Having to show these cards is more embarrassing than being naked.
It's frustrating, but I'm not about to start throwing cards through people...
Very practical, actually! This chain mail is designed to be light and quiet and keep me from getting all cut up in a fight!
Of course! I'm not really keeping it a secret here, Bobobo.
How? I really couldn't tell you...
For that to happen, you would need to find a master who can teach you to be a ninja! It isn't easy though, Bobobo. Are you really sure you want to do that?
Hey! I wouldn't cheat like that! At least, not when I'm just playing for fun!
Exactly how sure of that are you?
There might be, but I wouldn't really recommend it. It's better just to wear quiet clothes.
Really? Does that mean there are a lot of ninja where you come from?
Well, I would rather win, but I'm not worried about losing, Sofia. You don't need to worry about me.
Well, if being a ninja isn't interesting enough for you, maybe you'd like to hear about my mermaid powers. I doubt you've ever met a mermaid before.
Well, not as much as I'd like. I probably have just as much as anyone else here.
Sneak in? Sneak in where exactly, Sofia?
I think the only one of us who is nervous about seeing more of me is you, Sofia...
If it's Edo you want to know about, I'm something of an expert. After all, I just call it "home!"
Oh, really? Do you think you would prefer I was wearing black?
You presume too much, milord. If I meant to do you harm, we wouldn't be standing here exchanging words so casually...
Is that what foreigners like? I guess I don't really have a habit of showing myself to them, but it seems they preferred chasing the geisha around to anything else.
Oh, yes! I've got a very special, super secret agenda here!
Well, kunoichi are trained a little differently from the male ninja. The emphasis is less on combat and more on espionage and subterfuge. Since we're women, people are quick to underestimate us.
I wouldn't count yourself out so quickly, Jura. A good kunoichi could disguise herself as a man if needed. It might be uncomfortable, but even you could do it.
Ghosts are no problem. When ghosts threaten Edo, I send them back to the underworld in two pieces.
... If that's some sort of joke, I'm afraid I don't get it.
Hey, what's with the attitude? I don't remember being so rude to you!
Actually, I wouldn't be all that surprised. I've run into more ghosts than I can count.
I don't see why you couldn't? It's really not the kind of thing I see ghosts wearing.
I stay hidden when I'm working, but I'm not here for work.
It has been awfully quiet recently. Nothing but thwarting kidnappings and punishing perverts, really.
Of course I wouldn't want that to happen... but have you seen some of the people who are already here? There's enough potential for peril even without me...
It's funny, I was thinking something similar. There is nothing wrong with some of the guys here, but I feel just as interested in some of he women.
Well, I don't usually have much time for cutting loose. I have to make the most of the opportunity.
Usually I'm behind the scenes, but some problems require a much less subtle approach.
While I appreciate the vote of confidence, things always turn out much better for me when we team up and work together!
Not as much of one as I'd like. It has been quieter recently, so quiet that I can actually have a hobby!
No, it was a senior kunoichi who taught me, a woman. It would've been awfully scandalous to have a male teacher for any part of the training.
And shouldn't you know better than to underestimate someone just because they seem to be on the back foot?
Twice in a row? I'm not getting psyched out, am I?
Again? That's... frustrating!
I'm not perfect, but I'm usually not so careless that I'd mess up twice in a row...
But I just took a turn! Shouldn't it be someone else this time?
H-hey! What's going on? Is my luck really just that bad?
Losing over and over really isn't all that fun...
Something weird is going on! Why is it just me?!
Even if it is just luck, I never thought I'd do this badly...
I can't win them all! Well, maybe I could, but what fun would that be?
Another loss isn't going to take the fight out of me, I promise!
You don't give up, do you? Too bad because I won't give up either!
Wow, this is gonna be a close game, isn't it?
I'm afraid you'll have to do just a little better than that before you get to see the goods, but I suppose you're one step closer.
You've held on this long. I guess you do deserve a little reward from me.
It'll take more than this to keep me down. Just try me and see!
Me again? Hm, maybe I should be flattered? Then again, maybe not.
No point in sweating it. I've gotten out of tougher situations before.
Right, right, I know the drill by now. I guess coming from behind will have to wait until later.
A kunoichi has to be ready to show a little skin to secure victory. I know this is more than "a little," but that just illustrates how good of a kunoichi I am.
Okay, so maybe I'm not going to win. At this point, I don't see why that would be so bad.
That's too bad, but I'll just have to step up my game!
I can't let myself fall behind! I know I can do better than this!
I'm not used to being the one who's the butt of the joke. I think it's sort of throwing me off...
Alright, I'm getting backed into the corner now. If there was a time for a reversal, it's now. I just have to make it happen, right?
Well, fair is fair. Losing like this is so embarrassing though...
I guess this is due to poor luck and a lack of preparation. Still, I shouldn't give up quite yet.
Really.
Can you blame me? I try not to ask questions I'm not prepared to learn the answer to.
In my experience, they keep the aspiring kunoichi and shinobi separated. You'd probably just be surrounded by other guys!
If I win at this point, it will have come at the cost of my pants coming off.
Bobo... bo...
Oil, sweat, and other fluids make your skin tacky and stick a bit. It's better to wear padded clothes that muffle sound.
I see! Well, even if they are ninjas, I promise that none of them are quite like me.
But I'm telling you, Sofia, that whatever I end up showing you is what I want you to see!
See? Not so boring now, am I? Maybe you'd like to see me transform?
I didn't mean to make it sound like I didn't have any sort of clue! If you've got a question, you should ask it!
Sofia, I didn't think you'd be so forward! But if you want me to touch you like that...
I wish I could get a read on you, Sofia. It doesn't seem like you're trying to be distant, but... I just don't know.
It's because I work so hard that there is no unrest. You have to nip these problems in the bud.
But I can't just sit around when there's trouble! It's easy enough to handle with a little help from the guys!
C'mon, Maria! You can't think of just one thing you would absolutely need help from a guy for?
Yeah! I've had time to bake treats that I can bring along on my missions and I've also been sneaking around looking at paintings as well!
They never really encouraged that. Always went on and on about how men and women are different. They like to be treated differently, spoken to differently... touched differently...
Yes... well, I think you're getting ahead of yourself. I'm not there... yet...
It's good to get away from Edo for a while. After everything that's gone on, I could use a break.
Honestly, I needed a break from Edo for a while. Things there have just been one crazy incident after another.
I think I needed a break from Edo. It feels like there's always something catastrophic going on that needs my attention.
If things are going to be peaceful in Edo for a while, maybe I should think about dating again.
If Edo were to enter an era of peace, maybe I'd have enough free time to pursue a serious relationship.
It's been a while since I thought about romance, since Edo is being invaded by ghosts or aliens or a cult or some combination of those every other week.
I hope you don't expect a bunch of shuriken to fall out of my clothes while I take them off. There's nothing sharp to be seen here!
You're not expecting a bunch of ninja tools to come tumbling out of my clothes, are you? Honestly, I wouldn't be so careless.
Thinking you'll get a peek at where I keep all my weapons? Sorry to disappoint, but it's just me under here!
I wonder what the guys are up to? Goemon and Ebisumaru. Staying out of trouble, I hope.
You know, I don't see a whole lot of Goemon or Ebisumaru unless we're in big trouble. I wonder what they're getting up to now?
It's kind of a shame I only see Goemon and Ebisumaru when Japan needs to be saved. They certainly keep things lively.
You know, kunoichi receive some special training...
When training to be a kunoichi, you learn more than just combat and stealth...
Back when I was training to be a kunoichi, I learned some interesting things...
Being like this with someone... it makes me so nervous... promise you'll be gentle with me... gentle with... it...
I'm not used to anyone seeing me... down there. If it's you though... I think I'd want you to do more than look...
I've been getting hotter this whole time. I... I can't take it anymore. Just look how I've gotten...
I don't see how that's my problem? I'm not going to just wear a sign that says "I am a ninja."
Oh, I find lots of people value transparency...
I wish I could say I'm surprised.
I'm really not that worried about it... although, I'd rather not do worse than you do, Bobobo...
Huh, well, you might've been right. I hadn't really started yet...
Well, I didn't say there were no advantages to it...
Hm? Is that so? Well, I guess I'll just have to prove it then...
Well, then maybe you need to take a closer look...
W-wait, what? Who is Pia? What's this about rain?
Oh, you want to get some playboy off your back? Ugh. I get it. Even ignoring them sometimes makes them want you more. You just have to tell him as clearly as you can that you're not interested!
Don't get cold feet on now me, Sofia... but you are cute when you're flustered...
You say that, but the way you say it and that look in your eye... it's almost like...
You're a wily one yourself, Maria. Don't think I won't be looking out for you too!
Whoa there! It's just a turn of phrase! They all pull their own weight, I promise!
... I can't even pretend I don't know exactly what you mean by that.
You might be right, but on the other hand I like being a ninja.
Man or woman, everybody is different. I still think there are secrets I haven't learned, and I'm feeling more open to any sort of teacher nowadays...
... I'm just... I haven't had this sort of thrill in... in what feels like forever...
Come to think of it, it's been pretty peaceful for a lot longer than usual back home. Maybe that's why I was so bored...
Although, it was pretty quiet back home. I got so bored with nothing to do that I ended up here.
Now that I'm saying it out loud though, there hasn't really been anything real crazy recently. Actually... it's been downright boring.
Maybe I'll even look outside of Edo for someone special. I mean way outside.
Just to be clear, that's me being flirtatious. It is not an invitation to attack Edo. Incidents have started over less...
It has been some time though, so maybe I need a good, vigorous warm-up.
I'm a bit better than that! If you want to find out where I'm hiding my weapons, you'll have to give me a reason to use them!
Trust me, it's never a good idea to conceal your weapons using your clothes. It's way too obvious!
A ninja worth her salt wouldn't be unarmed just because she's naked.
That's not to say I wish they were here. Besides, if Omitsu ever found out Goemon was in a place like this she'd probably do something unspeakable to him.
And no, I don't wish they were here right now. I've seen enough of Ebisumaru's butt to last me a lifetime. I'll leave him to his fans.
Although, if they were here right now they might get up to no good. They are still thieves after all...
It is traditional for a kunoichi to be skilled in the art of seduction. I consider myself a very traditional kunoichi.

The art of seduction is a very useful skill in getting what you want without resorting to violence. I'm afraid I might be a little rusty, so I could sure use a helping hand to get some extra practice in.
A kunoichi has to learn how to use her appearance to allure and distract her enemies. Of course, those sort of skills are good for people who aren't enemies too.
And then when you look up from there, I have a bazooka pointed at your face. It's a bit of an extreme tactic, but it's never not worked.
And next thing you know there's a knife at your throat and you have to give me the documents or gold or so on. A desperate measure, but an effective one!
And while your eyes are down there, you don't see me getting my sword out up here. A classic last resort misdirect that works each and every time.
That should take a little bit of the fight out of you!
Having a bit of trouble?
I promise there was no sleight of hand involved...
Oooh, ~target~? I don't mind that at all!
No use in complaining. You might as well make the best of it.
Try and leave a good impression, okay!
Sorry, ~target~, but that's just how the game is played.
Well, how did that happen, I wonder...
You don't think a little part of you just wanted to lose this time, do you?
Alright, let's have it, ~target~. No need to be shy!
See? Patience will always be rewarded.
I'd say it's high time you took a hit!
I didn't have such a hard time just to miss out on seeing the rest of ~target~...
Finally! It's about time!
No more holding back from you, okay?
Come one, ~target~. I think it's only fair!
A little more ~target~ wouldn't go amiss...
I can't be the only loser here! Why not fall down a few levels?
You didn't expect me to go easy on you, did you?
It's not so simple to get the best of a kunoichi. This isn't the first gambling den I've battled in.
It's every girl for herself here. You understand, right?
Go for it, ~target~!
Don't you think it's more fun if we all take turns?
Hehe, this is fun!
No big surprise there. Sorry, ~target~.
If you want to cheat to try and win, I might let you get away with it for a round or two.
It always feels nice when a risk pays off in the end!
Just think of this is a chance to try out your powers of seduction.
Alright, ~target~, don't leave us hanging.
I hope you're not getting distracted, ~target~!!
I don't spend much time with other girls, so I'm glad to be in ~target~'s good company!
Yeah, sometimes the risk doesn't really work out, does it?
No, no apologies this time, ~target~. Strip for us.
That's too bad, ~target~, but keep your chin up. You haven't gotten a game over... yet.
Hmm, more ~target~? I was just thinking about her...
Hey, someone had to take the fall!
Nothing to see here!
Nothing to see here!
Nothing to see here!
Nothing to see here!
Nothing to see here!
Way to kill the momentum...
You won't be able to slide by on the bare minimum forever...
You're not exactly bending over backwards to impress us!
Subtlety is not the best way to leave an impression.
Just trying to sneak past us this round, huh?
I was expecting a bit more from you, ~target~...
You're going to chicken out now? Are you serious?
And the momentum is totally killed...
Hmph, zero impact...
I think maybe you're taking this too seriously.
Maybe that wasn't the stroke of luck it seemed...
I'm sure a bit of quiet patience will win out in the end anyway.
I guess I shouldn't be surprised you're saving the best for last.
I'm going to get you when you're least expecting it, ~target~! I guarantee it!
Let's see if we can't find that little piece of you that wants to be naked!
Do you maybe have a more ambitious body double you could swap out with?
C'mon, ~target~, let's see what you've got!
You might not have time to take it slow, you know?
I guess we'll just have to leave ~target~ behind in the dust and enjoy ourselves without him...
Are you really not feeling at all compelled to pick up the pace even a little?
What would it hurt to show us you're serious, huh?
Everyone here is dressed so strangely. I was worried you all might be weirdos.
You'd have an easier time relaxing if you'd just let loose!
There's always a trick to these gambling houses to ensure the house always wins. Here? Honestly, I'm not so sure. Who even is the house?
I am glad you're here, ~target~. I don't usually get to spend time with other women.
Maybe I did come here a little over prepared. Something tells me nobody is going to start trouble to~background.time~.
It's too bad we don't have any tea to help us relax while we wait.
Feeling shy? Why not just go for it?
Does this count as flirting wherever you're from, ~target~?
You don't have to be completely naked to masturbate, you know.
You've got no guilt just leaving us all curious, huh?
It wouldn't be any fun if you threw in the towel too quickly. Just don't forget to lose later!
If we're going to be taking our time, we may as well get to know each other.
I'd rather you lose again, but I'll be patient. I'm not so mean that I'd go and cheat over something so small!
Modesty has it's own time and place, ~target~.
You could keep us waiting, but we're not going to hang back and wait for you forever!
Hm, I wonder if it would be difficult to pull off a look like yours...
You'd better hurry up, ~target~, or you'll be high and dry in the very end!
Is taking a victory lap really what you want to be doing right now?
Aren't you feeling anything yet? I feel like I must have made quite the impact by now!
You're lucky you're cute enough to get away with being this slow.
Why make a fuss when I'm sure karma is going to make you lose again real quick!
You won't be able to sneak by forever!
Are you feeling the pressure yet? Maybe feeling a little something else?
Now this is the way to go!
You may want to balance out your losses!
This isn't a problem you can just throw koban at.
It could be worse, couldn't it, ~target~?
Maybe coming down one level will make you easier to deal with.
Well, you're not like the other guys I know. Yeah, you're far less reckless.
I still think you could put on more of a performance.
You sure know how to mystify a girl...
Say, are you popular with girls back home? Are you mobbed by roving bands of fans?
So when do we get to the point where you really start showing off?
I guess it's good you're not too eager to get naked.
Honestly, it's just nice to meet a man who isn't bent on destroying Edo or opening the gates to hell...
You're not the kind of guy who would do a striptease to get out of your teahouse bill, are you?
You have our permission to get way more naked than that!
I'm used to guys having less clothes on when I'm already like this...
So, how badly are the women of your world missing you to~background.time~?
Go ahead and get comfortable. You might not get a chance if things don't go well for you.
You sure are a lot less eager to strip down to your smallclothes than the guys I usually hang out with.
No need to be shy, ~target~. I'm pretty sure we all know why you're here.
I don't mean to rush you while you're getting comfortable, but there is a temptation...
I guess you came prepared for this mission, huh?
Don't think you'll be able to hide anything from me. I know every trick in the book!
I hope you don't think you'll get off this easy each time!
Do you need any help with that?
Is this going one bit at a time thing a way for you to tease us?
I think you could be even more eager than this!
There are other ways to impress us beyond beating us at cards.
If that's what it takes to keep the game moving...
I bet you're pretty popular back home, huh? I guess we should count ourselves lucky.
I guess I do own a lot of clothing, but they're mostly disguises.
You're not like the girls in Edo, that's for sure...
Maybe you do have plans to make this table your stage...
So do you mostly spend time with guys too? What's your story exactly?
It makes for a compelling preview for your next loss!
So, ~target~, do you normally do this with other girls, or...?
I'm sure you'll get over this once you've lost a couple more times!
I find I'm less and less interested in what kind of men you have around back home...
I wouldn't mind having your company down on my level, ~target~.
Now this is what I got out of Edo to see...
Go for it! Give us a little show, okay?
Men don't usually have a lot of trouble getting at least this naked. Would you say you're the same way?
I knew taking a trip here wouldn't be a waste of time.
Sorry, but a good kunoichi doesn't stop until she's exposed all your secrets.
I for one am not going to miss your ~clothing~. We don't need anything else getting in between the two of us.
Between the two of us we could make a scandal, if you're feeling brave enough now.
You don't give up without a fight, huh?
Guess this means I'll find out if I've gotten all excited about nothing or not.
I'm not really concerned with whether it's fair or not. Remember: I uncover secrets on a professional level.
Strike a pose! Go for it!
I mean this in the nicest way possible, but I really hope you lose completely.
I'm losing track of who is getting taken in by who.
You don't really have trouble meeting women, do you? What stroke of luck brought you to us, ~target~?
I hope you don't feel like you've been duped by me. It would be a shame if I had slipped up somehow.
I think it'd be fun to let you seduce me for a while.
And now we're both up to no good! Glad to have you along.
I was beginning to wonder if my dream of seeing what you've got to offer would ever come true.
You should have known karma was going to come back around and bite you, right?
Don't think there isn't danger still lurking for you.
How do you feel about a little skinship between women, ~target~? Purely platonic or...
It's not like I haven't had to sidle up to another woman for work before.
I was wondering how I'd feel getting naked with another woman.
Don't expect me to stand here like I'm not interested in what you're doing, ~target~.
Maybe this place needs a lucky cat statue, but who exactly would luck favor in that case?
I was wondering early on what sort of undergarments people from other worlds wear...
Does undressing like this with another woman excite you too? It's different than being at the bathhouse, right?
And just like that there's no more hiding.
I was thinking luck hasn't been on our side to~background.time~, ~target~, but I'm suddenly feeling very fortunate.
I knew this was going to be fun, but I didn't know it was going to be this fun!
Neither of us are at home anymore. You should relax! Let it roll off of you!
Between your body and your garments, you're a lot to take in...
I know I'll be even happier when we get the full package.
Obviously, you've got nothing to be ashamed of.
There's no convincing me that you're not popular back where you come from.
I didn't realize I'd feel this close to you...
Hm... I wouldn't mind stealing more than just secrets from you...
Feel free to show us your little dance for when you've stripped down. Don't tell me you don't have one!
The further along we get, the more I think I'd like to explore something with you...
No more playing coy now, ~target~. You had to have seen this coming.
This won't bother you if you're really feeling yourself.
I bet you're thinking this is your chance to show off. You're not wrong if you are.
Getting ready to go for a swim?
Hey, take your time. The performance is part of the allure.
In my experience, you can't talk a guy out of this sort of thing.
It's hard to believe you made us wait at all for this one.
Oh, now it's really getting steamy...
And we haven't even had any sake.
I've waited long enough for this one!
As if things weren't hot enough yet...
You know... I know some women you'd be popular with. That's not to say I'm not one of them...
I don't actually have an issue with men like you, just a man who hopefully isn't too much like you...
A word of advice: always lead with this. Who could complain?
I can already tell you're going to be a lot more fun like this.
C'mon, show yourself off a little! Don't we get a show too?
I knew this would make things better. Don't you feel better, ~target~?
I had a feeling you weren't about to disappoint.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ was just getting in our way anyways.
... I really have been working to hard...
Like my imagination wasn't running wild enough...
So... ~target~... what are you thinking?
You're lucky you're this attractive or all this effort might feel wasted.
So the little lord is going to come out of the palace?
No tricks to~background.time~. Just a mix of teasing and admiration... if you're lucky.
So is this a proud moment for you a shameful one?
We can make just a little fun of you, right?
This is all trouble of your own making. Don't blame me!
It's a little rude to make a girl work for it so much, but I'm willing to forgive you.
Lucky me! I was wondering if I was waiting around for nothing.
Patience pays off, even if you've got impure motives...
Hey, you got to see me like this, so I think this is only fair!
If you've got the courage to go through with this, I'm interested to find out exactly why.
You are having fun... right?
I can appreciate a weapon that's easy to conceal.
... Not quite as exciting as I had hoped.
Are things not exciting enough for you yet?
We're going to have to do something about that, ~target~.
I still think you could be a lot of fun...
... You know what? I think you're still holding back something.
You can't let a little thing like size get in your way...
Now, let's get that blood pumping a little more!
I don't think I'll be able to take you seriously now. At least you'll be easy to beat!
There's no way I'll miss out on seeing you in action.
This will make it much easier to tell what you're thinking!
I could get used to the real you!
You're far more calm about this than I was expecting. Let's see what we can do about that...
I had a feeling you'd be a capable man!
Would it be possible to coax a little more out of you?
There is a point of diminishing returns, I think...
That's kind of... it's hard to say. I guess I just feel more concerned than enticed?
That seems uncomfortable... for you.
W-wow! The men outside of Edo are really something else!
You know... I carry around a big gun myself.
That's--- I am impressed you were able to conceal all that...
I knew there was something extra about you to like...
Oh, I never back down from a challenge...
I've never experienced something like that... makes me wonder...
It has been a while for me, but I'm not afraid to dive in at the deep end...
... I'm not used to... being at a disadvantage...
Flashing does make for a good distraction, but I just avoid situations where that is necessary... or just have Ebisumaru do it.
I hope you realize there's no reason to be nervous. Who in their right mind would have anything bad to say about boobs?
